match.authors: Natasha Jaques, Asma Ghandeharioun, Judy Hanwen Shen, Craig Ferguson, Àgata Lapedriza, Noah J. Jones, S. Gu, Rosalind W. Picard
match.title: Way Off-Policy Batch Deep Reinforcement Learning of Implicit Human Preferences in Dialog

citance.context: Jaques et al. (2017);Ziegler et al. (2019) propose a conservative fine-tuning approach moderated by a KL penalty between the trained policy and the original LM, discouraging large deviations.
